title-part.text: MAKING CONTAINERS OF PAPER, CARDBOARD OR MATERIAL WORKED IN A MANNER ANALOGOUS TO PAPER

reference.text: making wound articles, e.g. wound tubes, B31C; combined making and filling B65B

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated: "rigid or semi-rigid containers" includes:containers not deformed by, or not taking-up the shape of, their contents;containers adapted to be temporarily deformed to expel their contents;pallets;trays;"flexible containers" includes:containers deformed by, or taking-up the shape of, their contents;containers adapted to be permanently deformed to expel their contents.

title-part.text: Making rigid or semi-rigid containers, e.g. boxes or cartons

note.note-paragraph: In this group, it is desirable to add the indexing codes of groups B31B2100/00 – B31B2120/00.

Group B31B50/00 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups B31D1/00, B31D3/00, B31D5/00, B31D5/02, B31D5/04 and B31D99/00.
Group B31B50/00 is also impacted by reclassification into group B31B50/59.
All groups listed in this warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

the lining material being a plunger, a web, a sheet or a bag to be forced into the box, e.g. by using heat
involving forming of the liner before inserting
by folding a sheet or blank around an inner tubular liner
by applying wrapping material only on the side wall part of a box
having integral corner posts or reinforcements

title-part.text: Indexing scheme associated with group B31B70/00, relating to making of flexible containers
Flexible containers made from sheets or blanks, e.g. from flattened tubes
